titleStmt.title: Cantvs. Of Thomas Morley the first booke of canzonets to two voyces
Canzonets, voices (2)
titleStmt.author: Morley, Thomas, 1557-1603?
Morley, Thomas, 1557-1603? Tenor. Of Thomas Morley the first booke of canzonets to two voyces.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Thomas Snodham, for Matthew Lownes and Iohn Browne,

notesStmt.note: Two partbooks, each with separate dated title page and register. At head of title, part 1, "Cantus."; part 2, "Tenor.".
The roman numeral date is made with turned C's.
Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery, San Marino, California.
